dcterms:description: A large-scale e-commerce product background generation dataset covering more than 60k product images from over 2k categories, designed to improve the efficiency of background generation for advertising images.
dcterms:title: BG60k

dcterms:creator: Roman Suvorov

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1k products and their original backgrounds from over 200 categories, used for comparing generated backgrounds with original ones.
dcterms:title: BG1k

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 1.6k pairs of product and reference images to evaluate the ability of generating backgrounds with personalized style.
dcterms:title: BG-pair
